title: Honyek
author: Honyek
content: l have been in this forum for sometime now and l have heard about the members getting merit for level upgrade, and something like how many merit someone got within 120 days. Considering my observation and what l have heard, it is a very vital requirement that is difficult to get. l want to ask about how someone can get merit, is it something that can be gotten through posting useful content, or is it something that can be gotten by chance or luck?

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.created_time: September 01, 2023, 11:28:36 AMLast edit: September 02, 2023, 05:44:43 AM by Hatchy
comments.body: I think you are getting it wrong op, you earn merits not out of chance neither luck. Merits are earned when you make useful contributions to the forum. Don't worry about how much time it takes you to earn merits. Just do good things here on Bitcointalk like making posts in the boards where merits are possibly given, sharing your knowledge (without plagarising), and you'll definitely earn some merits. Many beginners have asked the same question in the past, but my answer remains the same. Quoteearning merits isn't super easy, but it's not terribly hard either. If you focus on your contributions and don't obsess over merits, they will come unexpectedly.I decided to give you one, to help motivate and encourage you into creating more quality post. With this you see that it isn't very hard just try. (I would have given earlier, but didn't have any s merits)

comments.author: Nwada001

Sometimes, you get merited for a post you least expected would fetch you one.Another thing to note is that these merits are like rewards for a good job well done and since nothing good comes easy, you'd have to earn it.

Merit is vital that's why it isn't cheap and easy to get and be less concerned about merits you have in the last 120 days because it's going to take you alot of months before that should be paid attention to (merit in last 120 days is only important when you're looking for a signature campaign to join).

I think you might as well ask the other related question that has been asked and answered on the forum a bunch of times, something like:how earn btc from online???

comments.body: Quote from: Honyek on September 01, 2023, 11:26:14 AM l want to ask about how someone can get merit, is it something that can be gotten through posting useful content, or is it something that can be gotten by chance or luck?This is a forum where people come to learn mostly, and if you are sharing a content that has value and has the potential for someone to learn from, you will likely get merit from the person who is learning from you, or from someone who understands the importance of the content you have shared. You can also be lucky and receive merits by chance, but that is in a case where a merit source in the board where you have posted, just decides to distribute merits randomly to forum users there, but it does not always happen. The best way to get merits is to share useful contents.
